attributes.action: Dominic Raab to become prime minister and deliver a no deal brexit.
attributes.background: Theresa May has let the country down in such an unforgivable manner. Dominic Raab can lead a positive no deal agenda.  It's time for a no deal brexit no later than 31st October.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:
https://www.royal.uk/queen-and-government
